instruction: Converta para Python o código do IBM RPA a seguir
input:
defVar --name studentAverage --type Numeric --value 8
if --left "${studentAverage}" --operator "Greater_Than" --right 7
    logMessage --message "Congratulations! You can participate in the draw!" --type Info
endIf

instruction: Converta o script a seguir para python
input:
defVar --name studentAverage --type Numeric --value 7.5
if --left "${studentAverage}" --operator "Equal_To" --right 10
    logMessage --message "Congratulations! You have been approved for the Advanced Mathematics course with a perfect score!" --type Info
elseIf --left "${studentAverage}" --operator "Greater_Than" --right 7
    logMessage --message "Congratulations! You have been approved for the Advanced Mathematics course!" --type Info
else
    logMessage --message "Unfortunately, you were not approved for the Advanced Mathematics course, your grade is below the cut-off mark." --type Info

instruction: Converta para Python o script do IBM RPA a seguir
Converta o script do IBM RPA para Python
input:
defVar --name verifyValue --type Numeric

while --left "${verifyValue}" --operator "Less_Than" --right 5
    incrementVar --number ${verifyValue}
    logMessage --message "${verifyValue}" --type "Info"
endWhile
output:
verify_value = int()

while verify_value < 5:
    verify_value += 1
    print(verify_value)

instruction: Faça a converção do script do IBM RPA a seguir para Python
input:
defVar --name verifiedValue --type Numeric --value 8

while --left "${verifiedValue}" --operator "Less_Than" --right 5 --negate
    logMessage --message "${verifiedValue}" --type "Info"
    decrementVar --number ${verifiedValue}
endWhile

instruction: Faça a converção, para Python, do Script do IBM RPA a seguir
input:
defVar --name baseValue --type Numeric --value 35
defVar --name i --type Numeric
defVar --name x --type Numeric
defVar --name limit --type Numeric

generateRandomNumber --minimum 1 --maximum 8890 limit=value
logMessage --message "Limit: ${limit}" --type "Info"

for --variable ${i} --from 0 --to 254 --step 1
	evaluate --expression "${baseValue} * ${i}" x=value
	logMessage --message "${i} x ${baseValue} = ${x}" --type "Info"
	if --left "${x}" --operator "Greater_Than_Equal_To" --right "${limit}"
		break
	endIf
next
output:
import random

base_value = 35
limit = random.randint(0, 8890)

print(f"Limit: {limit}\n")

for i in range(0, 255):
    x = base_value * i
    print(f"{i} x {base_value} = {x}")
    if x >= limit:
        break

instruction: Converta para Python o script do IBM RPA
input:
defVar --name sumResult --type Numeric

evaluate --expression "5.0 + 5.0 / 2.0" sumResult=value
logMessage --message "Sum Result -> ${sumResult}" --type Info

instruction: Faça a converção do script a seguir para Python
input:
defVar --name baseURL --type String --value "https://esaj.tjsp.jus.br/cpopg/open.do"

webStart --name TJFirefox --type "Firefox" --userprofilepreferences "AutomationOptimized"
webNavigate --url "${baseURL}"
webWaitElement --selector "Id" --id radioNumeroAntigo --timeout "00:00:01"
webClick --selector "Id" --id radioNumeroAntigo
webWaitElement --selector "Id" --id nuProcessoAntigoFormatado --timeout "00:00:01"
webClick --selector "Id" --id nuProcessoAntigoFormatado
webWaitElement --selector "Id" --id nuProcessoAntigoFormatado --timeout "00:00:01"
webSet --value 10255174020148260053 --selector "Id" --id nuProcessoAntigoFormatado
webWaitElement --selector "Id" --id botaoConsultarProcessos --timeout "00:00:01"
webClick --selector "Id" --id botaoConsultarProcessos
delay --timeout "00:00:5"
webClose --name TJFirefox
output:
from botcity.web import WebBot, Browser, By
from botcity.maestro import BotMaestroSDK

base_url = "https://esaj.tjsp.jus.br/cpopg/open.do"
BotMaestroSDK.RAISE_NOT_CONNECTED = False

bot = WebBot()
bot.headless = False

bot.browser = Browser.FIREFOX
bot.browse(base_url)

bot.wait(500)
radio_numero_antigo = bot.find_element(by=By.ID, selector="radioNumeroAntigo")
radio_numero_antigo.click()

bot.wait(500)
nu_processo_antigo_formatado = bot.find_element(by=By.ID, selector="nuProcessoAntigoFormatado")
nu_processo_antigo_formatado.send_keys("10255174020148260053")

bot.wait(500)
botao_consultar_processos = bot.find_element(by=By.ID, selector="botaoConsultarProcessos")
botao_consultar_processos.click()

bot.wait(5000)
bot.stop_browser()
